## 自定义样式

````css
html .face-input--themes-cute,
html .face-input--themes-cute.face-input--focus,
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-form-input,
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-form-textarea,
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-prepend-wrap,
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-append-wrap {
    border-color:pink;
}
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-prepend-wrap,
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-append-wrap {
    background-color:#fff5f5;
    color:indianred;
}
html .face-input--themes-cute.face-input--focus,
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-form-input:focus,
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-form-textarea:focus {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 0.125em rgba(251, 175, 175, 0.3);
}
html .face-input--themes-cute .face-input-append-wrap-content-search {
    background-color: #fff5f5;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px pink;
    color:indianred;
}

````
